185706617.review:
Road Redemption é um jogo excelente para quem busca uma combinação de ação frenética, corrida e combate. Inspirado no clássico Road Rash, o jogo moderniza a fórmula ao adicionar mecânicas mais profundas, gráficos atualizados e uma dose de caos que mantém a adrenalina alta do início ao fim.

Jogabilidade

A essência de Road Redemption está em seu gameplay viciante. O jogador assume o controle de um motociclista em uma gangue, enfrentando adversários em pistas cheias de desafios. O combate corpo a corpo é o destaque, permitindo o uso de armas como tacos, espadas, correntes e até armas de fogo. A física do jogo é satisfatória, e o impacto dos golpes torna cada corrida imprevisível e emocionante.

Além disso, o jogo conta com elementos de progressão, como upgrades para o personagem e a moto, o que incentiva o jogador a continuar avançando. A dificuldade é balanceada, mas pode ser desafiadora em alguns momentos, especialmente em níveis mais avançados.

Gráficos e Som

Embora os gráficos não sejam ultra-realistas, eles cumprem bem seu papel. O estilo visual é estilizado, com cenários variados que incluem desertos, cidades e rodovias perigosas. A trilha sonora é outro ponto forte, com músicas intensas que combinam perfeitamente com o clima de ação e velocidade.

Modo Multiplayer

O modo multiplayer é uma adição divertida, permitindo que você enfrente amigos ou outros jogadores online. A competição é ainda mais intensa, e o caos aumenta com a presença de oponentes humanos, tornando cada corrida uma experiência única.

Pontos a melhorar

Apesar de suas qualidades, Road Redemption não é perfeito. O sistema de colisão pode ser inconsistente em alguns momentos, e a câmera às vezes dificulta a visão durante manobras mais complexas. Além disso, o jogo pode parecer repetitivo após longas sessões, especialmente para quem busca variedade nas missões.

Conclusão

Road Redemption é uma ótima escolha para quem gosta de jogos de corrida com um toque de violência e adrenalina. Ele consegue capturar a essência de seu predecessor espiritual enquanto traz novidades suficientes para se destacar por conta própria. Se você procura um jogo divertido e desafiador para jogar sozinho ou com amigos, Road Redemption é uma aposta certeira.

185687185.review:
This takes me back to the days of sitting on my buddies basement playing Road Rash for hours on end back in the 90's. This isn't quite Road Rash, but I enjoy it just as much. Very satisfying game play, with real skill that you have to acquire and adapt to in order to achieve success in the game.

My only complain is I wish the upgrades worked a bit more like the classic Road Rash, but there are upgrades nonetheless. 

For this price point, one of the best games in my library for a fast and satisfying 30-45 minute session. Can't always be playing Hearts of Iron!

185629082.review: Amazing Game, Played This awhile ago. Ian and Paul are amazing dudes

185607356.review:
If you liked Road Rash, you will like Road Redemption.

Road Redemption on combination of racing game and a action game. You race with your bike and kill other drivers. This time there much more weapons that baseball bat, pipe, baton or chain. There is machete, shovel, dynamite, shotgun etc. Action has options and there is few different variations on goals too.

Game is rogue-lite, so you have to start from the beginning when you die, but you can upgrade your characters, so game gets easier. Until you get further and challenge rises. It might feel difficult at first, but when you get the hang of it, game starts to get easier.

Few big issues come from control. If you play with controller, you cannot remap buttons, which is pretty big problem, since few mappings do not work as well as I'd hope. If you play with keyboard and mouse, there is different kind of issue. Some actions do not feel natural with default button configurations or they need adjusting. Some factors are not as finetuned as one might hope and need some time to get used to.

But overall Road Redemption is fun game. At first it might take some time to get a hang of it, but after a while, it is easy game to pick and play.


+ High octane action and racing
+ Brutal combat and several weapons
+ Upgrading keeps flow going

- Controller inputs cannot be remapped
- Repetition
- Takes time to really get a hang of it

7,5/10


JOS ROAD RASH NAPPASI AIKOINAAN. ROAD REDEMPTION ON HYVÄ VALINTA.

185464025.review:
它值得“好评”，但算不上好，到处都有奇怪的问题，但是绝对算不上真正意义的差，奈何没有中评，只能倾向于“不推荐”的一边。
1、抛开和暴力摩托的种种不谈，本作摩托的速度有时候明明没有那么快，但还是难以操纵；有时甚至微小的地形就会严重影响到车子的行进方向。
游戏主线居然是肉鸽的形式，就只能反复反复开战役刷那一点点可怜的经验值。
2、主线的难度也是倍增的，前几关可以让你轻松度过，后面敌人的血量直接暴涨，第一名总有着不合理的身位优势，而你唯一的办法就是打掉敌人获得加速然后反复这个行为超过第一。
那么问题就出现在了这里，越是往后的关卡，如果没有足够的数值支撑，敌人越难以击倒，敌人对你造成的伤害还越来越高，甚至大量加入了中立npc（不影响名次的npc）进行干扰，它们的攻击欲望也越来越强烈，如果手头没有加速，甚至会出现5、6辆车搅拌在一起攻击的头疼场面。
3、糟糕的汉化质量

185289421.review:
Some good potential but ... the game is just badly designed and structured ... :/ shame as it could be a comeback for this genre.

- Feels like a cheap mobile game / unfinieshed demo.
- Can't change colour of the bikes ... 
- CAN'T REBIND CONTROLLER (SERIOUSLY ?!?!)
- NO LOOK BACK ON THE CONTROLLER ?!?!?! (IN A RACING GAME!!!???!?!?)
- Risk vs reward is ridiculously bad, you can easily get killed or loose a chunk of health, meanwhile you get almost meaningless amounts of cash and health back for kills. You need the kills to get nitro, and you need nitro to win the races, but you're always risking ending the game while getting no rewards.
- You can't heal and regen nitro between races reliably because a handful of shop items is all random. The prices are random as well, 75% nitro regen can cost almost a 1000 and another time a full tank can cost less than 400 ... pricing and items are all over the place.
- All event types are random as well, so you might be getting the most difficult types of events all the time if you're unlucky.

On paper randomising everything sounds fun, but in reality it sucks. You should always have the ability to heal (at least a certain amount) and reload nitro between races. Shop item prices should be structured and make some sense.

At the moment it feels random, but not in a good way, and cheap. Shame because it could've been a great little game.

This demo is worth 2 bucks if that.

185272464.review: As many others have stated, Road Rash is the obvious inspiration for this game and is the reason many of us have picked it up. The reviews here are Very Positive and that is because the game is high quality. If you're looking for a Road Rash clone, this isn't it. This is a Rogue-Lite with modern replayability that I believe melds well with the older, simpler style of gameplay. Frankly if someone is complaining about this game, they just don't understand the mechanics, or were expecting something else entirely. This game is pretty cool and just the right amount of challenging. If you want an easy peasy experience that just gives you a nostalgia trip, this a'int it. The Devs made a solid modern video game on the foundations that Road Rash built, but the game is its own thing. Which I respect and appreciate. I think you will too.

185135459.review:
Nein, weil es einfach nur Zeit verschwendet. Man verliert ständig und kann nichtmal nochmal das Level in dem man gestorben ist spielen. Nach drei Wiederholungen drückt man auf X. Zwar ist das Gekloppe ganz lustig, doch dieses immer wiederkehrende und das man immer wieder den gleichen Scheiß nochmal und nochmal spielen muss, bis man endlich Level 6 vom Anfang freigeschaltet hat, das nervt unglaublich. Wir sind doch nicht in den 90ern, als man alles nochmal  von vorne spielen musste :D

Nach mehr als 10 Stunden Spielzeit kann ich sagen, es lohnt sich doch :D
Doch man muss wirklich immer wieder immer wieder und immer wieder von vorne anfangen, bis man die nötigen Erfahrungspunkte erreicht hat, um alles freizuschalten was man braucht, damit es flüssiger läuft :D

Wenn man das einmal erreicht hat, dass ist es ok, dass es immer wieder anfängt :D
Dann macht es irgendwie auch Spaß. 

Da besteht auf jeden Fall Besserungsbedarf. So geht das einfach nicht.

185052612.review: Beta sürümünden beri takip ediyorum şu anda ilk defa denedim ama beklentilerimi karşılamadı. Oyunun mekanikleri çok ham. Trafikteki yapay zeka berbat arabadan kaçmak için sola kırıyorum araba da aynı şekilde sola kırıyor. Savaş mekanikleri ve silahlar tatmin edici seviyede. Özellikle kılıçla adam doğramayı çok beğendim. Gel gelelim campaign bölümüne... Abi 90 ların jeton yutan atarileri zorluk seviyesi yapıp oynanılabilirliği neden düşürüyorsun. Diyelim öldün hangi bölüm olursa olsun direk 1 den başlıyorsun. Oyun 3 6 9.bölümlerden tekrar başlatabiliyor ama onu yapabilmek için yetenek ağacında o skili açmak lazım. O skili açabilmek için de saatlerce oynayıp xp kasacaksın. Onun yerine daha güzel bir campaign hazırlayıp 3-5 saatte bitecek şekilde olsaydı ne ben bu yorumu yazardım ne de iade etmek isterdim.

纯纯未成品。你要说新手局玩个乐子，打折确实是个好游戏，但战役++就有你玩的了。ai拥有高贵的“无碰撞体积”和无视“物理引擎”的转弯向心，这游戏后期没有黄金车就算以战养战全程氮气加速都无法追上的ai。更别提化学屋顶的恶心程度。这游戏没有刹车，是的。我可以这么跟你讲。没有刹车，他呢个刹车键是干啥用的呢，转弯飘逸用的，换个说法，默认全程150以上的车速。你贴上粘弹，没法两秒以内快速降速。只能紫砂一样的高速拧车头。或者给对方踹开。

Not the longest grind but we are 14hours in and still need to upgrade/unlock characters/bikes. grab some homies and tear sheet up or what?

184964667.review:
Якщо ви хочете пограти у гру-бойовичок, яка влаштовує тотальний треш, угар і содомію на дорогах від лиця відбитого на всю катушку байкера під наркотиками - це ваш вибір.

Гра сама по собі весела. Феєрія ультранасильства на мотоциклах. 
Якщо правильно грати, то тут ви можете влаштовувати геноцид водіїв та інших учасників дорожнього руху.

Сюжет - 4 шибайголови з 10. Нічого особливого, зав'язка банальна. Тримається за рахунок несподіваних рандомних подій та деякої харизми головних героїв (босів в основному).
Графіка - 8 підірваних байкерів з 10. Особливо не деталізована, але загальна динаміка така, що на якісь дрібниці просто не звертаєш уваги. 
Ігролад - 10 обгашених креком мотошибайголів з 10. Все в стилі Тарантіно, тільки з вибухами і ось цим луплячим адреналіном по венам.
Музика - 10 електрогітар з 10. Дійсно дуже непогане музло, яке перемежовується від легенького року, до індастріал і агресивного прогресив-металу. Деякі композиції дуже навіть непогано слухати і без гри.
Атмосфера і деталі - реально на 10 з 10. Те як ви вилітаєте і будете з цього реготати, падаючі автомобілі і фінальна поїздка по веселковим трасам - це ідеально відповідає атмосфері.

Автори явно надихались дуже старою Road Rush, але вирішили зробит акцент на бойовик, тотальний угар і безмежне ультранасильство під приходом.

Рекомендую.

184919993.review:
It's... fine. 

I grew up playing Road Rash for the Genesis and *some* of this game scratches some of that itch.  The elements from *outside* of Road Rash feel pretty bad to me.  Having a block button in melee doesn't feel great to me.  Enemies blocking you even when you hit them in the middle of their attack animation feels bad. Rubberbanding works to make them slow down as you approach but also to speed them up as you start to creep past them and this makes it harder to get away from enemies than it needs to be (if you get surrounded you might hit the break to avoid getting hit, only to find the enemies magically stay close to you because of the rubberbanding).  The rogue-like elements feel undercooked and uninspired.  5% extra attack this run?  Oh boy sign me up.

Once you get out of the opening area you start hitting maps that feel more Carmageddon inspired than Road Rash, for better or worse.  It takes forever to unlock new bikes and they don't seem especially interesting.  You carry a bunch of weapons on you instead of stealing them from other bikers, which would be more interesting if they made more use cases.  "Stage hazards" like cars falling from the sky, combined with a low camera angle, make it possible to drive into unavoidable crashes. The crashes themselves seem to have too little consequence for the rider, whereas getting sandwiched between two enemies can end a run in seconds.  Lots of questionable design choices here.

I enjoyed the first couple of hours and then burned out on it.

184846595.review:
[b]Mosh Jondie’s Review of Road Redemption [/b]

There’s something uniquely satisfying about roaring down an endless stretch of highway, a crowbar in hand, and chaos unfolding in your wake. Road Redemption brought me back to my Road Rash 64 days—the ones filled with split-screen laughter, bruised egos, and the timeless art of knocking your buddy off their bike with a well-timed kick.

The game leans heavily into its Road Rash lineage, but with enough modern twists to stand on its own. The combat? Pure carnage. The weapons? More imaginative than anything my childhood self could’ve dreamed of. And the sense of speed? Let’s just say I missed a few turns because I was too busy enjoying the ride.

But let’s be real—after an hour or two, you start to notice the cracks. The loop of “race, fight, upgrade, repeat” gets a little too familiar. That said, I’ve found that a 10mg gummy can do wonders for spicing things up. Suddenly, every swing of the pipe feels like poetry, every explosion like the crescendo of an epic symphony.

At $3 on sale? It’s a no-brainer. Road Redemption may not be perfect, but it’s a beautiful tribute to a time when gaming was simpler and a lot rowdier. Whether you’re chasing nostalgia or just need to blow off steam, this one’s worth your time—and a few bucks.

Mosh Jondie approves.

184674711.review: Ich kann über das Spiel wirklich nichts Gutes berichten. Auf Mac OS M1 ging erst der Xbox Controller (bei allen anderen Spielen ging er) nicht. Ein Update des Xbox Controllers (per Windows Laptop) ging zwar, zerschoss allerdings die Koppelung am Mac. Nach einiger Zeit und vielen Tweaks (Tipp: Controller an unterschiedlichen Geräten koppeln, öfters Bluetooth-Verbindung am Mac resetten) ging es. Im Spiel selbst wurde der Controller weder auf Mac, noch Windows erkannt. So haben 0,7 Stunden ausgereicht, um das Spiel lieben zu lernen. Sehr schade darum. Ich habe Road Rage sehr gemocht und freute mich auf einen würdigen Nachfolger. Wer auch immer das Spiel zum Laufen bekommt: Es könnte sein Geld wert sein. Für mich war es das nicht, trotz Sale-Angebot.

184567687.review:
The rogue-like aspects didn't seem necessary, using systems that would've worked as RPG progression. Also the lack of specific characters to race against meant that taking out enemies was pretty soulless. Having to start from the beginning after each death and having the missions randomised again seemed unnecessary. 

I reached a "cop" mission where police cars repeatedly rammed me head on, they were driving on the wrong side of the road and it felt like they came out of nowhere. I refunded pretty quickly.

This is the first time I've reviewed a game even before the refund window closes but my god! is this an addictive game. After so long time, I've discovered a game that makes me forget about everything other than the game itself. Please give it a shot if -
1. You liked playing Road Rash
2. You like arcade like no nonsense, pure gameplay games
3. You like driving,jumping and crashing bikes
4. You like punching,beating,cutting and shooting enemies
5. You like feeling adrenaline rush
6. You desire a split screen upto 4 player local multiplayer game
7. You want to discover a new fun game
That's all I can think of at the moment. Please give this game a shot!

Блевотный саундтрек, который не запоминается и вообще не заинтересовывает.
В этом куске говна ужасно всё! Ты играешь в неё и не наслаждаешься, а просто ругаешься и нервничаешь (при том, ты нервничаешь не из-за самой задумки в сложности и освоении игры, типа, ну, не знаю... Супер Мит Бой) - ты нервничаешь из-за идиотского управления вождения байком.

P.S. кстати, когда игру купил, в меню была кнопочка "Получить бесплатно игру!" (что-то они там раздавали) - я нажал на неё, оставил свой E-mail адрес для получения игры. Вот уже как полгода жду игру на почту. Ничего не прислали мне! А ещё скриншоты на страничке магазина приукрашены донельзя! Нет там такой графики, какую вы рекламируете!
